title: SCOTUS John Roberts is Queen Elizabeth’s Right Hand Man
cleaned_text:
Was the Pilgrim Society’s patron Queen Elizabeth’s May 07, 2007 visit to President Bush and Chief Justice Roberts at the White House (mentioned in this article below) just coincidence, or was the Queen there to give Pilgrims Society mini-King Roberts his marching orders?

Remember, Chief Crown Prosecutor Allison Saunders sneaked to America and had a private dinner at Bruce and Nellie Ohr’s home (Bruce Ohr: one of the Senior Executive Service’s (Crown Agents) paymasters at the DoJ) just five days before the infamous Trump Tower meeting?

Jane Sullivan Roberts is a Jesuit. That would explain John Roberts sneaking off to a Knights of Malta hideaway after his Obamacare vote on Jul. 03, 2012

Notice the flag flying on top of the Pilgrims Society’s Maidstone, Kent Archives

Photos: Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II’s visit to President George H. Bush at the White House, May7, 2007

President George W. Bush and guests toasts Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II of Great Britain following welcoming remarks Monday, May 7, 2007, during the State Dinner in her honor at the White House. White House photos by Eric Draper.

Ceremonially, Chief Justice John G. Roberts, Jr. is sitting at the Queen’s right hand at dinner (and behind her at the concert). The Queen is the Patron of the 1,100-member Pilgrims Society of Great Britain and the United States (founded by Cecil Rhodes New World Order Robber barons in 1902, 1903 respectively). Justice Roberts’ father John G. Roberts, Sr. was a C.I.A.-Pilgrims member via his employers – The First National Bank of Maryland (he approved the sale to Allied Irish Bank in 1983 as a newly-minted director) and Bethlemen Steel (owned by Pilgrims founders Charles M. Schwab & Andrew Carnegie). Presidents George H.W. Bush and George H. Bush are Pilgrims, as well as numerous White House cabinet members including Casper Weinberger, General Alexander Haig, George Schultz, Henry Kissinger, Rupert Soames (SERCO), Sir Nick Clegg (FACEBOOK), Lord Mark Malloch Brown (George Soros, UN), Sir Geoffrey Pattie, Prince Andrew and Prince Charles. The British Monarch is the Patron to whom both the British and American Pilgrims Society members pledge fealty. This is the treasonous and seditious “special relationship” secret propaganda-intelligence system cited ad nauseum by “Deep State” shadow government proponents of a corporate-fascist “New World Order” run by self-styled elitists using socialism and eugenics to control the citizens.

See The Pilgrims of Great Britain and the United States – A Centennial History, Profile Books, London (2002, 2003); A Declaration of Interdependence. Lib. of War Lit. New York (Jul. 04, 1918); A Parliament of the Press, The First Imperial Press Conference, Horace Marshall & Son, London (Jun. 05-28, 1909); Empire Press Union, London (founded Jul. 23, 1909); Parliament formed of MI6, MI5, GC&CS now GCHQ (Jul. 29, 1909) by recruiting Empire Press Union members from the Reuters, Associated Press, Daily Telegraph, Daily Mail, Guardian, London Times, Financial Times, Irish Times, Belfast Telegraph, Cape Times, New York Times, Washington Post, Chicago Tribune, etc.; A Declaration of Interdependence. Lib. of War Lit. New York (Jul. 04, 1918); Pilgrims founding member and U.S. library financier Andrew Carnegie bankrolled a pro-British rewrite of American Revolutionary history, Am. Lib. Assoc. (Nov. 30, 1909).

Senior Executive Service (SES) must be abolished forthwith. The British Crown agents must be prohibited in operating in the U.S. or participating in USAID and OPIC anywhere in the world. Defund both the SES, Crown Agents, USAID and OPIC immediately.

.Hopefully things will be changing now that we are AMERICA FIRST.
